Name: Average time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-AE Assign Reviewers
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the next occurrence of SW-Reviewer Agreed within the same case
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Minimum time it takes to perform SW-AE Assign Reviewers after SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Average duration of the period starting with SW-Reviewer Declined and ending with SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Total time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Awaiting EIC Decision in variants that include major revision cycles
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to Assign a Different Editor
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Assign a Different Editor'

Name: Total time it takes SW-Reviewer Declined to be followed by Unassign Reviewer
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Unassign Reviewer'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-Reviewer Unavailable when both occur in the same reviewer assignment cycle
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Unavailable'

Name: Total time between SW-Reviewer Declined and SW-AE Recommendation overdue in prolonged review paths
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Recommendation overdue'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Reviewer Declined to SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 1 week late'

Name: Average time between SW-Reviewer Declined and the next execution of SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Total duration from SW-Reviewer Declined to Manuscript Export Succeeded in accepted manuscript trajectories
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'

Name: Average time it takes for SW-AE Assign Reviewers to recur after SW-Reviewer Declined in high-complexity variants (e.g., those with >3 reviewer declines)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Reviewer Declined' and activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'
